title: sagarbansal21
author: sagarbansal21
content: CIFDAQ's Founder & Chairman Himanshu Maradiya, Joins the board of Metaverse Education CouncilWe are pleased to announce our Founder & Chairman, Himanshu Maradiya, is officially a board member of the Metaverse Education Council.We are assured that Himanshu's contributions will make remarkable milestones in the blockchain space.Read More: https://medium.com/@CIFDAQ/with-plans-to-revolutionize-the-global-education-industry-himanshu-maradiya-joins-the-metaverse-4c2245e28a7c
